item.title: Michigan State Stays Undefeated After Beating UNC in Fort Myers Tip-Off
item.description: No. 11 Michigan State kept rolling in a statement, double-digit win over away No. 16 North Carolina 74-58 in the Fort Myers Tip-Off.

item.title: On Thanksgiving, Matt LaFleur Thankful for Fortunate Call: 'They Got It Right'
item.description: The Packers head coach knows he got away with a close call that helped decide Green Bay's win over Detroit on Thanskgiving.
